description_html:
Ultraleather® | Pearlized adds a little sparkle to the mix, highlighting the classic natural grain with a subtle luminescence that provides a hint of luxury and refinement. The sensorial experience is further elevated by its sophisticated texture and silken touch. The Pearlized color palette is chic yet transitional, delivering a focused mix of options.

With features that include enduring performance (14+ weeks hydrolysis results), the highest levels of abrasion resistance, and inherent stain resistance, Pearlized is a well-suited choice that will make an impression in any setting.
